title: Nvidia's half-a-trillion dollar wipeout leaves global chip stocks volatile
content: Global semiconductor stocks saw volatile trading on Tuesday after a slump in shares of Nvidia during the previous session.
summary: Global semiconductor stocks saw volatile trading on Tuesday after a slump in shares of Nvidia during the previous session.

title: Rivian secures up to $5 billion from Volkswagen, shares soar 40%
content: Volkswagen plans to invest up to $5 billion in electric vehicle startup Rivian, starting with an initial investment of $1 billion.
summary: Volkswagen plans to invest up to $5 billion in electric vehicle startup Rivian, starting with an initial investment of $1 billion.

title: Sixteen Nobel Prize-winning economists warn a second Trump term would 'reignite' inflation
content: Trump says he would make his first-term tax cuts permanent, impose universal tariffs on all imports and pressure the Federal Reserve to cut interest rates.
summary: Trump says he would make his first-term tax cuts permanent, impose universal tariffs on all imports and pressure the Federal Reserve to cut interest rates.

title: German airline Lufthansa hikes ticket prices by up to $77 due to environmental costs
content: Lufthansa Group said Tuesday that it would add an “environmental cost surcharge” to ticket prices as soon as this week.
summary: Lufthansa Group said Tuesday that it would add an “environmental cost surcharge” to ticket prices as soon as this week.

title: Tesla recalls Cybertruck to fix faulty windshield wipers, loose trim
content: Tesla has issued its third and fourth recalls on its Cybertruck, which hit the market late last year.
summary: Tesla has issued its third and fourth recalls on its Cybertruck, which hit the market late last year.

title: EU charges Microsoft with 'abusive' bundling of Teams and Office, breaching antitrust rules
content: The European Union on Tuesday accused Microsoft of breaching antitrust rules with the "abusive" bundling of its Teams and Office products.
summary: The European Union on Tuesday accused Microsoft of breaching antitrust rules with the "abusive" bundling of its Teams and Office products.

title: Pictures show police clashing with anti-tax protesters in Kenya's capital
content: Earlier in the day, the Kenyan parliament announced it had passed a second reading of the contentious Finance Bill 2024.
summary: Earlier in the day, the Kenyan parliament announced it had passed a second reading of the contentious Finance Bill 2024.

title: U.S. auto sales are expected to slow during the second half of 2024
content: Vehicle inventory levels are growing, incentives are increasing and there's growing uncertainty surrounding the economy, interest rates and U.S. election.
summary: Vehicle inventory levels are growing, incentives are increasing and there's growing uncertainty surrounding the economy, interest rates and U.S. election.

title: How a 34-year-old went from making $40,000 right out of college to $400,000 now at TikTok
content: Sora Lee didn't plan on going into tech after college. Here's what she's learned working at Netflix, Meta and TikTok, and how much money she's made.
summary: Sora Lee didn't plan on going into tech after college. Here's what she's learned working at Netflix, Meta and TikTok, and how much money she's made.

title: I'm an exec in Finland, the happiest country in the world—3 ways my company closed our gender wage gap
content: Finland has a history of being the happiest country in the world, and it's also among the most successful at advancing gender equity.
summary: Finland has a history of being the happiest country in the world, and it's also among the most successful at advancing gender equity.

title: Bitcoin bounces above $62,000, Solana leads cryptocurrencies higher
content: Bitcoin's move coincided with a rebound in Nvidia and the Nasdaq Composite.
summary: Bitcoin's move coincided with a rebound in Nvidia and the Nasdaq Composite.

title: Waymo opens robotaxi service to all San Francisco users
content: Waymo said nearly 300,000 people have signed up for the service, called Waymo One, since the Alphabet-owned company opened its waitlist.
summary: Waymo said nearly 300,000 people have signed up for the service, called Waymo One, since the Alphabet-owned company opened its waitlist.

title: Ferrari CEO says all-electric model preserves the 'emotion' of the famed supercars
content: Ferrari is opening a new E-Building in Maranello, Italy, that will produce internal combustion engine cars alongside hybrid and all-electric models.
summary: Ferrari is opening a new E-Building in Maranello, Italy, that will produce internal combustion engine cars alongside hybrid and all-electric models.

title: China employing 'gray zone tactics' at contested Second Thomas Shoal, Lowy Institute's Yaacob says
content: China is employing “gray zone tactics” against the Philippines in contested waters as it avoids wider conflict with the U.S., according to one expert.
summary: China is employing “gray zone tactics” against the Philippines in contested waters as it avoids wider conflict with the U.S., according to one expert.

title: Airbus shares fall 9% as company cuts 2024 guidance on targets, deliveries
content: Shares in Airbus fell on Tuesday after the company said it was cutting its targets for 2024, including aircraft deliveries and earnings.
summary: Shares in Airbus fell on Tuesday after the company said it was cutting its targets for 2024, including aircraft deliveries and earnings.

title: Fed Governor Bowman says she's still open to raising rates if inflation doesn't improve
content: Federal Reserve Governor Michelle Bowman said Tuesday the time is not right yet to start lowering interest rates.
summary: Federal Reserve Governor Michelle Bowman said Tuesday the time is not right yet to start lowering interest rates.

title: These are the world’s best airlines according to Skytrax — including a new No. 1
content: Singapore Airlines is no longer the best airline in the world, according to air transport rating firm Skytrax — instead Qatar Airways now holds the top spot.
summary: Singapore Airlines is no longer the best airline in the world, according to air transport rating firm Skytrax — instead Qatar Airways now holds the top spot.

title: Novo Nordisk's Wegovy weight loss drug approved in China
content: Novo Nordisk said Tuesday that its Wegovy weight loss treatment has been approved in China for long-term weight management.
summary: Novo Nordisk said Tuesday that its Wegovy weight loss treatment has been approved in China for long-term weight management.

title: VW updates 2025 Jetta to boost sales of the brand's entry-level car
content: The entry-level version of the Jetta with an automatic transmission will start at $21,995 when it goes on sale, expected by the end of the third quarter.
summary: The entry-level version of the Jetta with an automatic transmission will start at $21,995 when it goes on sale, expected by the end of the third quarter.

title: China’s Chang’e-6 lunar probe returns with first-ever samples from far side of the moon
content: China's Chang'e-6 lunar probe returned to Earth on Tuesday, bringing back the first-ever samples from the far side of the moon.
summary: China's Chang'e-6 lunar probe returned to Earth on Tuesday, bringing back the first-ever samples from the far side of the moon.

title: China's premier defends national competitiveness as trade tensions simmer
content: Chinese Premier Li Qiang on Tuesday defended the country's technological development while criticizing efforts to restrict global cooperation.
summary: Chinese Premier Li Qiang on Tuesday defended the country's technological development while criticizing efforts to restrict global cooperation.

title: He's only 28 but has revitalized France's far right: Meet the man who could be the country's next prime minister
content: Marine Le Pen's protégé, Jordan Bardella, could be thrust into one of the most powerful role in French politics.
summary: Marine Le Pen's protégé, Jordan Bardella, could be thrust into one of the most powerful role in French politics.

title: Tech giants bet next-generation optical networks will reduce AI's climate impact, aid 6G transition
content: The likes of Microsoft, Google, Intel, and Sony are working together on photonic networks, which use light rather than electrical impulses to deliver data.
summary: The likes of Microsoft, Google, Intel, and Sony are working together on photonic networks, which use light rather than electrical impulses to deliver data.

title: Mattel's Uno and other popular games will become colorblind accessible
content: Mattel announced that it plans to make 80% of its games colorblind accessible by the end of the year, before raising that amount to 90% in 2025.
summary: Mattel announced that it plans to make 80% of its games colorblind accessible by the end of the year, before raising that amount to 90% in 2025.

title: T20 World Cup: Afghanistan beat Bangladesh to reach semi-final and knock Australia out
content: Afghanistan reached a first ever World Cup semi-final courtesy of a dramatic eight-run victory over Bangladesh which in turn knocked Australia out of the T20 tournament.
summary: Afghanistan reached a first ever World Cup semi-final courtesy of a dramatic eight-run victory over Bangladesh which in turn knocked Australia out of the T20 tournament.

title: Oracle warns that a TikTok ban would hurt business
content: Oracle provides cloud services to TikTok, and is warning investors that a ban of the app could hurt the company's revenue.
summary: Oracle provides cloud services to TikTok, and is warning investors that a ban of the app could hurt the company's revenue.

title: Fast fashion retailer Shein confidentially files for London IPO as U.S. listing stalls
content: Shein confidentially filed for a U.S. initial public offering late in 2023, but the retailer has faced mounting backlash.
summary: Shein confidentially filed for a U.S. initial public offering late in 2023, but the retailer has faced mounting backlash.

title: China wants EU to scrap planned higher tariffs and 'abide by WTO rules,' state media reports
content: Scrapping the tariff decision on Chinese EVs is set to benefit both sides, Global Times reported, quoting observers.
summary: Scrapping the tariff decision on Chinese EVs is set to benefit both sides, Global Times reported, quoting observers.

title: Southeast Asia is a top choice for firms diversifying supply chains amid U.S.-China tensions
content: Rising tensions between Washington and Beijing have led firms to diversify supply chains away from China even as they maintain a presence in the country.
summary: Rising tensions between Washington and Beijing have led firms to diversify supply chains away from China even as they maintain a presence in the country.

title: Singaporean swimmer Toh Wei Soong hopes for a medal in his second Paralympic bid
content: Singaporean para-athlete Toh Wei Soong will be fighting to medal in the Paralympics this year in Paris.
summary: Singaporean para-athlete Toh Wei Soong will be fighting to medal in the Paralympics this year in Paris.
